According to some other sites, it doesn't work with 64bit systems.  So maybe that's the problem.  Not sure.  Thx for the torrent anyway.

I figured out how to play it. I was also getting the "Game not installed" error.

Download CorsixTH, a Theme Hospital mod for current systems, then point it to your game installation directory when you install it. 

http://code.google.com/p/corsix-th/downloads/list
